archimate:Requirement.name: Vulnerability risk acceptance and risk monitoring framework
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Gartner Vulnerability Management Cycle: Accept Risk
Sometimes, remediation or mitigation measures for a specific vulnerability or system are not available or feasible, or the side effects are too risky to be acceptable
Need automation to ensure quick response and handling of findings to ensure compliancy and security. Integration with patch management and patching processes.
